item.title: 微软再次尝试让人们使用 ChatGPT 型聊天机器人
item.description:
Microsoft Copilot 将更名为 Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat，这是自 2023 年以来该商务助手的第二次更名。【原文：

Microsoft Copilot is being renamed Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat, the second rebranding of the business-focused assistant since 2023.

】

item.title: 通胀缓解推动美联储降息押注，国债大涨
item.description: 由于美国上月通胀放缓的程度略高于经济学家的预测，一些人对美联储今年将进一步降息的押注重燃，国债反弹。【原文：Treasuries rallied as inflation last month eased in the US by slightly more than economist had predicted, reinvigorating some bets that the Federal Reserve will lower interest rates further this year.】

item.title: 美国核心通胀率六个月来首次下降
item.description: 在持续数月的潜在通胀加快说服美联储发出暂停降息的信号之后，美国 12 月份的消费者物价涨幅低于预期。【原文：US consumer prices rose in December by less than forecast after months of faster underlying inflation persuaded the Federal Reserve to signal a pause in interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 波兰认为特朗普不确定性减弱，推动兹罗提债券上涨
item.description: 波兰预计，随着唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫的不确定性减弱，外国投资者对波兰债券和东欧债务的冷淡情绪将有所改善。【原文：Poland expects the lukewarm foreign-investor sentiment toward its bonds — and eastern European debt in general — to improve as uncertainty surrounding Donald Trump’s return to the White House subsides.】

item.title: 可可下跌，交易商等待磨粉数据提供需求线索
item.description: 可可期货下跌，因为市场正等待分析主要消费地区的第四季度碾磨量数据，以寻找在价格创历史新高的情况下的需求线索。【原文：Cocoa futures fell as the market waits to parse fourth quarter grindings data from key consuming regions for clues on demand in the face of record-high prices.】

item.title: 欧盟要求对芯片、人工智能和量子投资进行风险评估
item.description: 欧盟要求成员国审查其公司在非欧盟国家半导体和人工智能等敏感领域的投资。【原文：The European Union asked member states to review investments by their companies in non-EU countries in sensitive sectors like semiconductors and artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 图斯克表示波兰将加快乌克兰加入欧盟的谈判进程
item.description: 波兰总理唐纳德-图斯克（Donald Tusk）周三表示，波兰将在担任欧盟轮值主席国的六个月期间寻求加快乌克兰加入欧盟的谈判。【原文：Poland will seek to accelerate talks on Ukraine’s membership in the European Union during its current six-month rotating presidency in the bloc, Prime Minister Donald Tusk said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 政治危机加剧通胀风险，罗马尼亚维持利率不变
item.description: 罗马尼亚总统选举于上月被宣布无效，政治不确定性增加了财政和通胀风险，因此罗马尼亚央行维持借贷成本稳定。【原文：Romania’s central bank held borrowing costs steady as political uncertainty following last month’s annulment of the country’s presidential election adds to fiscal and inflationary risks.】

item.title: 斯塔默称里夫斯将在 "未来许多年 "担任英国首相
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）表示，蕾切尔-里夫斯将在 "未来许多年 "担任英国财政大臣，这是在英国资产受到市场动荡冲击后，他对英国财政大臣的最有力支持，这也使她的职位成为人们关注的焦点。【原文：Prime Minister Keir Starmer said Rachel Reeves will be Britain’s finance minister for “many years to come,” his strongest backing yet for his chancellor in the wake of market turmoil hitting UK assets that has put her position in the spotlight.】

item.title: 摩根大通刷新历史最佳年薪纪录，年薪增长 18
item.description: 作为美国最大的银行，摩根大通银行的年利润超过了美国银行业历史上的任何一家贷款机构。然后，它又做到了。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co., the biggest bank in the US, made more annual profit than any lender in the history of American banking. And then it did it again.】

item.title: 美国 12 月 CPI 报告分析
item.description: 1 月 6 日，旧金山一家商店内的购物者。摄影师：大卫-保罗-莫里斯/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Shoppers in a store in San Francisco on Jan. 6. Photographer: David Paul Morris/Bloomberg】

item.title: 欧佩克首次展望 2026 年石油需求将保持稳定增长
item.description: 欧佩克在对 2026 年的首次详细评估中预测，在印度和中国的推动下，石油需求将再有一年稳步增长。【原文：OPEC forecast another year of steady oil demand growth, driven by India and China, in its first detailed assessment of 2026.】

item.title: 亚洲不温不火的液化天然气需求为渴望天然气的欧洲提供了喘息机会
item.description:
人们担心的买方之间的价格战迄今尚未出现。【原文：

A feared price war between buyers has so far failed to materialize.

】

item.title: 数据大修前尼日利亚通胀率创近 29 年新高
item.description: 尼日利亚的年通货膨胀率在 12 月份攀升至近 29 年来的新高，而本月晚些时候将对数据进行全面检查，届时可能会降低通货膨胀率。【原文：Nigeria’s annual inflation rate climbed to a near 29-year high in December, before an overhaul of the data later this month that may lower the gauge.】

item.title: 沙特计划通过阿美石油公司与马登公司的合资企业促进锂业发展
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯的主要石油和矿业公司正在组建一家合资企业，生产能源转型所需的关键金属锂。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s main oil and mining companies are forming a joint venture to produce lithium, a key metal for the energy transition, as the kingdom pursues a bigger role in mining.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德计划以 13 亿欧元出售西班牙学生公寓业务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司正在出售其西班牙学生公寓业务 Livensa Living。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management is offering its Spanish student housing business Livensa Living for sale, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 史维特斯资源公司考虑出售 DJ 盆地资产
item.description: 知情人士称，Civitas Resources 公司正在探索出售其在丹佛-朱利斯堡盆地的部分或全部资产，这些资产的价值可能超过 40 亿美元。【原文：Civitas Resources Inc. is exploring a sale of part or all of its assets in the Denver-Julesburg Basin, which could be valued at more than $4 billion, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 美联储加息对减缓美国房市有多大作用？
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济学编辑，今天我们关注劳拉-柯蒂斯关于美国住房问题的报道。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston, and today we’re looking at reporting by Laura Curtis on US housing. item.title: 欧盟技术倡导者呼吁通过 EuroStack 实现更大程度的自力更生
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，吉安-沃尔皮切利（Gian Volpicelli）从布鲁塞尔报道了倡导者、政策制定者和学术界为推动欧洲数字独立（尤其是与美国大型科技公司的独立）所做的努力：EuroStack。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg's journalists around the world. Today, Gian Volpicelli reports from Brussels on an effort by advocates, policymakers and academics to push European digital independence, particularly from the Big Tech companies in the US, under a new banner: EuroStack.】

item.title: 世界如何应对特朗普的贸易动荡
item.description: 世界各国政府正争先恐后地准备应对唐纳德-特朗普的关税冲击。【原文：Governments around the world are scrambling to prepare for Donald Trump’s tariff onslaught.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率突破 7%，创去年 5 月以来新高
item.description: 上周，美国抵押贷款利率突破 7%，达到 5 月初以来的最高水平，并延续了长达数月的升势，这有可能抑制房地产市场。【原文：US mortgage rates topped 7% last week, reaching the highest level since early May and extending a months-long advance that risks restraining the housing market.】

item.title: 英国房价出现近两年来最快增长
item.description: 官方数据显示，在收入增加和赶在税收截止日期前购房者进入市场之后，英国房价以近两年来最快的年度速度增长。【原文：UK house prices increased at the fastest annual pace in almost two years, according to official data, after rising incomes and a rush to beat a tax deadline brought buyers into the market.】

item.title: 英伟达的 800% 反弹遭遇绊脚石
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）公司在过去两年中的涨幅高达 800%，但却遇到了绊脚石。【原文：Nvidia’s scorching 800% rally in the past two years has hit a stumbling block.】

item.title: 摩尔多瓦德拉古称俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司危机将使通胀率超过 10
item.description: 摩尔多瓦最高央行行长表示，由于俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom PJSC）决定切断对一个重要发电分离地区的天然气供应，引发能源危机升级，摩尔多瓦今年将面临两位数的通货膨胀。【原文：Moldova is bracing for double-digit inflation this year amid an escalating energy crisis triggered by Gazprom PJSC’s decision to cut off gas supply to a key power-generating breakaway region, the country’s top central banker said.】

item.title: 斗山将在布拉格上市，这是 2020 年以来首次大规模 IPO
item.description: 蒸汽轮机制造商斗山斯柯达电力公司宣布计划发行少数股权后，布拉格证券交易所正在为四年多来首次大规模首次公开募股做准备。【原文：The Prague Stock Exchange is preparing for its first major initial public offering in more than four years after steam-turbine manufacturer Doosan Skoda Power announced plans to float a minority stake.】

item.title: DRW 聘用前千禧年投资组合经理负责欧洲天然气业务
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，DRW 控股有限责任公司的欧洲商品交易部门正在聘用前千禧管理有限责任公司（Millennium Management LLC）的戴尔-吉巴德（Dale Gibbard），因为该公司正努力从能源市场的波动中获益。【原文：DRW Holdings LLC’s European commodities trading unit is hiring Dale Gibbard, formerly of Millennium Management LLC, as the firm pushes to benefit from energy market volatility, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国国债收益率在关键通胀数据公布前徘徊在 5%左右
item.description: 周三，美国消费者物价指数的新数据将把本已高企的美国政府债券收益率推得更高，甚至超过 5%的关键门槛。【原文：A fresh read on US consumer prices Wednesday stands to push already elevated US government bond yields even higher — beyond crucial 5% thresholds.】

item.title: 特朗普削减联邦工作岗位的计划使黑人工人面临风险
item.description: 当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）缩减联邦劳动力的计划将对黑人就业产生不同程度的影响，同时可能削弱许多黑人家庭世代依赖的经济流动性的关键渠道。【原文：President–elect Donald Trump’s plans to shrink the federal workforce would have disparate impacts on Black employment, while potentially eroding a key conduit to economic mobility that many Black families have relied on for generations.】

item.title: Investcorp 两名信贷交易高管即将离职
item.description: Investcorp Holdings 的两名信贷高管即将离职，这是中东最大的另类资产管理公司近几个月来的最新高管变动。【原文：Two of Investcorp Holdings’ top credit executives are leaving, marking the latest executive changes at the Middle East’s biggest alternative asset manager in recent months.】

item.title: 印度小组寻求对美国谋杀阴谋参与者采取法律行动
item.description: 印度政府的一个小组在调查了来自美国的涉嫌犯罪的信息后，建议对一个人采取法律行动。【原文：An Indian government panel recommended legal action against an individual after investigating information from the US about alleged crimes.】
